subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: John Tavares and Nikolay Kulemin scored in the third period, and the Islanders held on to beat the Nashville Predators, 4-3, at Barclays Center.
snippet: John Tavares and Nikolay Kulemin scored in the third period, and the Islanders held on to beat the Nashville Predators, 4-3, at Barclays Center.
